feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Blizzard Warning issued December 15 at 3:43PM AKST until December 16 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FOR BRISTOL BAY WEST OF DILLINGHAM FROM 5 AM TO NOON AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Visibility of one quarter mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...West of Dillingham.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Bristol Bay

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 3:43PM AKST until December 16 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 9 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches with lesser amounts inland from the coast. Visibility of one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Kuskokwim Delta
